def check_vowel(s,i):
    return 0 <= i < len(s) and s[i] in "aieouAEIOU"

def check_vowel(string, position):
    return  0 <= position < len(string) and string[position].lower() in "aeiou"

def check_vowel(s, pos):
    return 0 <= pos < len(s) and s.lower()[pos] in "aeiou"

def check_vowel(string, position):
    return 0 <= position <= len(string) and string[position] in 'aeiouAEIOU'

def check_vowel(stg, position):
    return 0 <= position < len(stg) and stg[position].lower() in "aeiou"

def check_vowel(s, i):
    return s[i].lower() in 'aeiou' if len(s) > i > -1 else False
